description: This is a modern 'Global View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

targets.expr:
# Total number of nodes - using kube-state-metrics
count(kube_node_info)

# Memory usage as percentage of request
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="instance-manager"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{container="instance-manager", resource="memory"})

# Memory usage as percentage of request for dashboard
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="dashboard"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{container="dashboard", resource="memory"})

# CPU utilization for database-controller (api + sync)
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container=~"database-api|database-sync"}[1m]))
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{container=~"database-api|database-sync", resource="cpu"})

# CPU usage percentage for all edu-range containers
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container=~"challenge-container|database-container|webos|terminal"}[1m])
)
/
sum(
  machine_cpu_cores
) * 100

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(windows_container_memory_usage_commit_bytes{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"} * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (namespace))

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(rate(windows_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (namespace))
avg(sum by (instance, cpu) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"idle|iowait|steal", cluster="$cluster", job="$job"}[$__rate_interval]))) by (instance)

panels.description: Shows the health status of each Harbor component. Green means up, red means down.
panels.title: Component Health

panels.description: Percentage of API requests that result in error (4xx and 5xx status codes)
panels.title: API Error Rate

panels.description: Number of API requests currently in progress
panels.title: In-flight Requests

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Global Network Utilization by device

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(rate(windows_container_network_receive_bytes_total{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (namespace))

- (sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(rate(windows_container_network_transmit_bytes_total{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (namespace)))

panels.title: Total Network Received (with all virtual devices) by instance

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Network Received (without loopback)  by instance

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Network Received (loopback only) by instance

title: Kubernetes / Views / Global
